summary: Adds a new spell to the game
descriptionHtml: This small mod adds a new spell into the game to give Skyrim a little more cc. Polymorph is an Alteration spell that will turn any non essential npc into a harmless critter for 25 seconds. excludes giants and dragons. Guards will not polymorph, it seems to bug on them. Currently the spell tome is on the bar in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Any suggestions please let me know! An update so that the tome may be purchased from certain vendors will be coming soon.
author: Gilsdank
